name: NutellaCreations
0:
”Alexa, open nutella creations”
”Alexa, ask nutella creations for crepes”
”Alexa, ask nutella creations to visit my recipe book”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nutella creations
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Nutella® Creations is feeling festive... and right in time for the holidays!

Meet our delightful cast of Holiday Helpers, here to share their favorite holiday Nutella® recipes with you and your family! Step into the Holiday Kitchen to discover fun recipes, from Christmas Tree-shaped Holiday Crepes with Nutella®, to Cinnamon Star Cookies with Nutella® and fresh hazelnuts. You can collect the recipes by email and even buy Nutella® to be delivered right to your door! 

If you want to bake now, jump right into step-by-step, hands-free instructions, or come back for them whenever you're ready.

Featuring:
- Five festive recipes suited for every level of baker
- Option to receive recipes by email, with additional recommended treats and a holiday surprise
- Guided, hands-free cooking instructions 
- Chance to purchase Nutella® right from the skill

Ready to get baking? Just say “Alexa, open Nutella® Creations” to start spreading the love.

Enabling contact permissions for this skill in the Alexa app allows users to receive the featured recipe by email at the address associated with their account. The email will only be sent to users who opt in while using the skill. Nutella® will not use user data for any other purposes.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app. To edit or cancel your purchase, just visit your Amazon cart.

To edit your reminders, you can ask the skill or make changes in the Alexa app.
